Interface Shop

All Known Implementing Classes:
ShopImp
public interface Shop
This is the primary interface for the java computer shop application
.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addCustomer(String name, int age, double currentBal)
    Given a concrete name age and balance, a customer can be created via sqlite
    void
    addMoneyToCustAccount(int id, double amount)
    Given an id and amount of money to add a customers balance will be updated with this amount, like an atm
    void
    displayCustomerInfo(int id)
    Given a concrete id, all relevant details relating to a customer can be listed
    void
    listCurrentStock()
    This method reads the names,stock and productNo from the computers table to inform the user on the stock levels
    void
    listItems()
    This method reads the computers table and lists all information relating to our selling items
    void
    listRecentOrders()
    This method lists all orders coming in
    void
    purchaseItem(int productNo, int id)
    Given a concrete id and productNo a customer is able to purchase an item which both adjusts their balance and our stock levels
    void
    removeCustomer(int id, String name)
    Given a concrete name and id, a customer can be fully removed from the sqlite database
    void
    saveReceipt(Order o)
    This method saves a receipt with information taken from the order class in order to save as a txt file

  • Method Details

    • addCustomer

      void addCustomer(String name, int age, double currentBal)
      Given a concrete name age and balance, a customer can be created via sqlite
      Parameters:
      name - - String name given by the customer
      age - - int age of the customer
      currentBal - - double current balance for the customer

    • removeCustomer

      void removeCustomer(int id, String name)
      Given a concrete name and id, a customer can be fully removed from the sqlite database
      Parameters:
      id - - int unique id customer
      name - - String name of the customer

    • displayCustomerInfo

      void displayCustomerInfo(int id)
      Given a concrete id, all relevant details relating to a customer can be listed
      Parameters:
      id - - int unique id customer to find display info

    • addMoneyToCustAccount

      void addMoneyToCustAccount(int id, double amount)
      Given an id and amount of money to add a customers balance will be updated with this amount, like an atm
      Parameters:
      id - - int unique id of customer
      amount - - double amount of money to be added to customer account

    • purchaseItem

      void purchaseItem(int productNo, int id)
      Given a concrete id and productNo a customer is able to purchase an item which both adjusts their balance and our stock levels
      Parameters:
      productNo - - product no of which customer will buy
      id - - int unique id of the customer

    • listItems

      void listItems()
      This method reads the computers table and lists all information relating to our selling items

    • listCurrentStock

      void listCurrentStock()
      This method reads the names,stock and productNo from the computers table to inform the user on the stock levels

    • listRecentOrders

      void listRecentOrders()
      This method lists all orders coming in

    • saveReceipt

      void saveReceipt(Order o)
      This method saves a receipt with information taken from the order class in order to save as a txt file
      Parameters:
      o - - Order created by customer to model the receipt
